info.title: ParcelLab Documentation
info.description: This is basic api docs from doga budaks parcellab challenge

tags: Gets Weather Details From coordinates and date time, weather details you get is on Celcius

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date and time should have following format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss[Z]. Example: 2020-04-24T12:00

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Coordinate value followed up by 2 digits after decimal. Example longitude: 11.55

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Coordinate value followed up by 2 digits after decimal. Example latitude: 48.14

400.description: Bad request. Latitude, longitude and date should be valid

500.description: Internal Server Error. There was an unexpected error

get.description: Returns the weather conditions on that given location

404.description: Tracking id does not exist in db

500.description: Internal Server Error. There was an unexpected error
